content.title: View the App
content.body:
1. On your Volt MX App, click Launch.
  2. You may see an Application Name text box. If there is a text box, enter EmployeeList and then click Launch.
  3. The form with the list appears.
  4. To Exit the app on your mobile device, swipe two fingers from left to right or shake your mobile or tablet and click Exit App.
